Test Name: Hepatitis B Virus Surface Antibody Screen, Qualitative/Quantitative
Purpose: To detect and quantify Hepatitis B Virus Surface Antibody (anti-HBs) in serum to determine immunity to HBV.
Container: Serum separator tube (SST) or red-top serum collection tube
Equipment: Microplate reader, plate washer, microcentrifuge, pipettes, and incubator
